com.impetus.services.mail

Class Variation_Thread_Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • com.impetus.services.mail.Variation_Thread_Action
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Variation_Thread_Action
extends com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Class Variation_thread_Action. Is used to dispatch emails when variation exceeds the change set by the user
    Author:
    prachi.singh

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Run method of thread that dispatches email if variation exceeds change set by the user. Calls checkchange method of variation_thread_manager class. dispatches mail by calling dispatchemail method of email alert class. calls delete method of variation_thread_manager to delete change set.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        See Also:
        Runnable.run()

      • variationThread

        public void variationThread()
        Variation thread. This method Initiates Variation thread
